wanshaya, kula gana katha karannata pera budunge bana padayak mathak kala yuthuya."nachachja wasalo hothi nachachja hothi brahmano kammana wasalo hothi kammana hothi brahmano" mehi arutha api ugath paridinam yamek bamuneku ho wasalayeku wanne upathin nowa ohu ho ayage kriyakalapaya anuwaya yannayi.meya athitha kula kendrika samajayata pamanak nowa wathman samajayatath ekalesa galape.wiwahayak karagannata giyath, wyaparayak karannata giyath,mathiwaranayata tharangakalath,sasune pawadi wennatath pamanak noweyi grama sanwardhana samithiye sabhapathi wimata pawa kulaya wadagathya.kohegiyath kula prashnaya matha siduwana hith amanapakam,asadharananam emataya.nuthana lokaye pawa minisun jiwath wanne hama leyakama pata rathuya yanna ha samadenama miyagiyawita yanne ekama thanataya yanna nodanna lesaya.me gothrawadaya kese ho nimawak dakiya yuthuya.ese nowannata ekata sitinnan pawa pagadamannawu me kula prashnayen pidawindinnange pramanaya thawa thawa wadiwanu atha.sama denatama samana ayithiwasikam himi me samajaye me us pahath kulamala bheda iwatha damimata thawamath pramada natha.ewita me samajaya thawathawath lassana wanu athayi yanna ape wishwasayayi.
